title: Where is my Kai' Sa
body: I have bought Kai' Sa  for 3 days, but I can't find her in champion selection part    {{champion:145}}    What should i DO ???

replies.body: **Submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further. Since it's an account specific issue we can't really help you here.
